data.name: Remnants of Naezith
data.detailed_description:
Feel the acceleration in this fast-paced grappling hook platformer, Remnants of Naezith.

It focuses on having freedom of movement, solid character control and not having any speed limitations. The fun of swinging with grappling hooks and the amazing feel of acceleration makes a great combination in this game.



You play as Kayra, a human who shares his body with the soul of the ancient thunder dragon, Naezith! With the powers granted to him by the dragon, Kayra will destroy the Remnants of Naezith, enchanted fragments of the dragon's body, to prevent anyone from exploiting their power for evil.


  • LEVEL SELECTION
    Proceed through four chapters with 20 branching levels in each.

  • SECRET LEVELS
    Find the hidden remnants to unlock secret levels.

  • LEADERBOARD
    Watch top player replays and improve your skills to ascend.

  • GLOBAL RANKINGS
    Get a badge depending on your overall performance and compete worldwide.

  • GHOSTS
    Race against other people's best times or your own.

  • SPEEDRUN MODE
    Try going through the entire game or a specific chapter as fast as possible.

  • CUSTOM LEVELS
    Explore the countless levels made by the community and design your own.

data.short_description: Rush and swing through levels to top the leaderboards in this fast-paced, grappling hook precision platformer.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, Spanish, German
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Remnants of Naezith shows gaming needs more grappling hooks”
Kotaku

“Absolutely enjoyable and masterful, Remnants of Naezith currently offers one of the best grapple hooks in existence.”
Canard PC 355, pg 56

“Can you handle this high speed?”
AUTOMATON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated card with OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 or above
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated card with OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS which can run the Steam client
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated card with OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
